name: Teen Rampage
description:
GAMEPAD Recommended

My entry for the Brackey's Game Jam 2021.2 as a Solo Dev (Code, 3D Model / Animation and Music done by myself for this GameJam from scratch)

OBJECTIVES:

Player must unleash as much chaos as possible damaging the traffic light controllers and avoid getting caught by the police

Pending:

- SFX
- Another music track
- Tutorial
- Better level design
- More fun stuff...

Made with Unity 2020.3.6
Assets made in Blender 2.93.0
Music recorded in Reaper 6.35
